State - owned power equipment maker BHEL  today said it has signed an initial agreement with PT Star Vyobros , Indonesia for setting up a 200 MW coal fired plant in the island nation .

RelatedSentence: The MoU was signed in a ceremony held in Jakarta , Indonesia by P K Uppal Executive Director , ( International Operations ) BHEL and Edi Yosfi , President Director , PT Star Vyobros .
